```{r setup echo = FALSE}
library(riskmetric)
library(dplyr)
library(tibble)
library(tidyr)
library(gt)
```

```{r warning = FALSE}
ns <- getNamespaceExports("riskmetric")
ns <- grep("^pkg_ref_cache|^assess", ns, value = T, ignore.case = T)

ns_df <- tibble(export=ns) %>% 
  separate(export, c("generic", "cache", "class"), sep = "\\.", remove = F)
```

```{r}
ns_df %>% 
  filter(grepl("assess", generic)) %>%
  select(generic, class=cache) %>%
  mutate(value=1) %>%
  pivot_wider(names_from = class, values_from = value) %>%
  gt()
```

```{r}
ns_df %>% 
  filter(grepl("^pkg", generic)) %>%
  select(func=cache, class) %>%
  mutate(value=1) %>%
  pivot_wider(names_from = class, values_from = value) %>%
  gt()
```
